text:
- ( music playing )
- ( record scratching )
♪ So I took a couple apples ♪

♪ You can just lay off,
I mean, they grow on trees ♪

♪ You couldn't take
the day off? ♪

♪ You agitate and irritate,
you threw my game way off ♪

♪ But now I'm here to tell you,
you can just "neigh" off ♪

♪ I'm horse-themed villain
and I'm spitting some rhymes ♪

♪ You're just a little girl,
and you're up ♪

♪ Way past your bedtime,
I'm not playing with you ♪

♪ There's no roping
or wrangling ♪

♪ I've got your partner
right here ♪
♪ Precariously dangling! ♪

♪ Don't worry 'bout my bedtime,
you are not my mom ♪

♪ And I didn't mean to interrupt
your little horse prom ♪
♪ You stole a cart of produce ♪

♪ How are you the one
that's mad? ♪

♪ And your rhymes are so corny,
you remind me of my dad ♪

- Whoa!
- ♪ Now you're gonna drop ♪

♪ My partner
in a vat full of acid? ♪

♪ Well, I hate
to break it to you ♪

♪ But that plan
is kind of flaccid ♪
♪ You think that's a threat? ♪
♪ I'm gonna help you out! ♪

- Horses: ♪ Oh-oh ♪
- ♪ You forgot he can fly ♪

♪ That's what
I'm taking about ♪
Word.

- ( groans )
- ( gasping )
